text: @realDonaldTrump The desperate MOB occupying the White House, is once again showing that it is all about him, never mind his mis handling of the COVID-19 pandemic, fumbling on foreign policy, his begging Xi to help him win in November, the 40 millions of unemployed, and his constant lying.
